articles.title: ADB sees Asia Pacific remittances up 6.7% in 2021, 5.9% in 2022 - Reuters
articles.description: Remittances to the Asia Pacific region from citizens working abroad could grow 6.7% this year and 5.9% next year, after a 2% slump in 2020, underpinned by further easing of COVID-19 curbs in advanced economies, the Asian Development Bank said.
articles.content: MANILA, Dec 28 (Reuters) - Remittances to the Asia Pacific region from citizens working abroad could grow 6.7% this year and 5.9% next year, after a 2% slump in 2020, underpinned by further easing of… [+1246 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Ex-PAP stalwart Phua Bah Lee dies at 89 - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Former People's Action Party MP Phua Bah Lee, a key figure in helping to build a raft of institutions in post-independence Singapore, died on Sunday (Dec 26). He was 89.
